training: You will now play a few practice rounds.
instructions:
You will now see the instructions for the next game.
You can press RIGHT to see the next instructions.
You can press LEFT to see the previous instructions.
instructions_perm: Press LEFT for the previous, RIGHT for the next instructions.
instructions_end: To start the game press LEFT. If you want to see the previous screen press RIGHT.

hcp.0.0:
This is a game of chance.
Think about it like drawing cards from a deck.
The cards have numbers from one to nine.
First, you will see a question mark on the screen and you make a guess, then the card will be presented.
You have to guess whether the number is LESS than or GREATER than five.
hcp.0.1:
Press LEFT to guess that the number will be LESS than five.
Press RIGHT to guess that the number will be GREATER than five.
You must answer while the question mark is on the screen.
hcp.1.0: After you answer, the card will be shown.
hcp.1.1:
If you guessed correctly,
a green arrow appears in the fixation cross and you WIN 1 point.
hcp.1.2: If not, a red arrow will be displayed and you LOSE 0.5 points.
hcp.1.3: If the result equals five, the fixation cross turns yellow and you gain nothing.
hcp.1.4: After each round we shuffle the deck.
hcp.2.0:
Remember:
Press LEFT to guess the number is LESS less than five.
Press RIGHT to guess the number is GREATER than five.
hcp.3.0:
Great!
If you have any questions, it is now time to raise them.

gonogo.0.0:
In this game, you will need to figure out whether it's better to press the button or to not press the button.
There are some situations where it's better to press or not.
In some situations you can WIN points, in other you can LOSE points.
gonogo.0.1:
Each situation is introduced by one of four images.
You have to learn from experience whether it is better to press or not for each image.


Press LEFT to continue
gonogo.1.0: In each trial you will see an image introducing the situation:
gonogo.3.0:
When the fixation cross turns white you have to decide:
Do you press LEFT or NOT?
gonogo.3.1: For this instruction please press LEFT.
gonogo.4.0: After a while you will get feedback if you made the correct decision or not.
gonogo.5.0:
Remember:
When the cross flashes white you have to decide!
Do you press LEFT or NOT?

two-step.0.0:
In this game you will make a series of choices.
First, you'll be given two images to choose from.
Your pick will lead you to the second stage.
two-step.1.0: Your first choice will lead to another decision between two images. The images you see depend on your first choice.
two-step.1.1: Choosing an image in the second stage will sometimes earn you points or not. Some images are better than others, but which ones are better changes slowly throughout the experiment.
two-step.2.0: The structure of the game looks like this:
two-step.2.1: Each first-stage choice has a 'preferred' second stage. For example, if you pick the image with the cross, you'll usually see the blue (left) images, but sometimes you'll see the yellow images instead.
two-step.2.2: This preference stays the same during the whole experiment.
two-step.3.0:
Remember:
In each trial you will need to make a sequence of two decisions.
Press LEFT to select the image on the left.
Press RIGHT to select the image on the right.

mid.0.0: In this game you will play with three shapes:
mid.0.1:
The yellow squares mean you play to NOT LOSE points.
The pink circles mean you play to WIN points.
The triangle means nothing is at stake.
mid.1.0:
The first thing that will happen in the game is one of these shapes will come up.
All you have to do is read the shapes to see if you play to WIN, to LOSE or if nothing is at stake.
After the shape you will see a fixation cross.
When you see the cross, you should just wait.
mid.2.0:
After the fixation there will always be a black shape that is the same shape as the one you just saw.
Your job is to press LEFT when you see a black shape.
mid.2.1: If you press to soon or do not press when the black shape is up, you will not receive the outcome for that shape.
mid.3.0:
Remember:

When you see a pink circle, you can WIN points.

When you see a yellow square, you can LOSE points.

When you see a blue triangle, there is nothing at stake.

Press LEFT when you see the black shape to WIN or NOT LOSE.

posner.0.0:
In this game, you will need to respond to a stimulus appears briefly on either the left or the right side of the fixation cross.
To gain points, you will need to indicate the side the target appeared on using button presses.
posner.1.0:
Before the target appears, there will be a dot on the top or the bottom of the fixation cross.
The location of the dot can help you predict, the side where the target will appear.
This game can be difficult, you should pay attention to the cue.
posner.2.0:
After the cue, the target appears, on either left or right side.
Press LEFT to indicate that the target appeared on the left.
Press RIGHT to indicate that the target appeared on the right.
posner.3.0:
There will be two breaks in the experiment.
After each break the side each cue predicts changes, so you need to adapt you strategy.
Please try to focus on the fixation cross in the middle of the screen for the entire game.
Try not to move your eyes to the target stimulus.
posner.4.0:
Remember:
Press LEFT to indicate that the target appeared on the left.
Press RIGHT to indicate that the target appeared on the right.

Answer as fast and as accurate as possible!

risk-sensitive.0.0:
In this game you will see five different images and decide between them.
Each image has a different value. Some images will always gain you the same amount of points, some images will give you points with 50% probability.
risk-sensitive.1.0: In the game you will sometimes see a single image on the left or the right side of the screen. You will need to select this image. Pressing LEFT if it is on the left and RIGHT if it is on the right.
risk-sensitive.1.1: These trials will help you to figure out the meaning of each image.
risk-sensitive.2.0:
In other trial you will need to decide between two images.
Choose in a way, that will earn you the most points.
Press LEFT to select the image on the left.
Press RIGHT to select the image on the right.
risk-sensitive.3.0:
Remember:
Press LEFT to select the image on the left.
Press RIGHT to select the image on the right.
